snippet: The Times’s pop critics, Jon Pareles and Jon Caramanica, discuss Bruce Springsteen’s album “Wrecking Ball,” which is to be released by Columbia on Tuesday.
abstract: New York Times’s pop critics, Jon Pareles and Jon Caramanica, discuss Bruce Springsteen’s album Wrecking Ball.

byline.original: By JON PARELES and JON CARAMANICA

lead_paragraph: The Times’s pop critics, Jon Pareles and Jon Caramanica, discuss Bruce Springsteen’s album “Wrecking Ball,” which is to be released by Columbia on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Pareles and Caramanica on Springsteen’s ‘Wrecking Ball’
headline.main: Springsteen: More Fanfares for Those Common Men
headline.print_headline: Springsteen: More Fanfares For Those Common Men
